Ha, thik ache.

Thik ache. Onek manush janto na je condom use korle teen pregnancy prevent kora jay, ar sexually transmitted infections jemon Flaminia ar HIV thekeo bacha jay. Ora khub effective ei byapare. Ar ekhon condom paoa khub sohoj, local health departments-e free te condom paoa jay, ar local pharmacy, drug stores-eo paoa jay. Clinic gulo teo paoa jay, kichu fee diye ba sometimes free te. Ar manushra ora carry korteo khub sohoj, gaari te ba pocket-e rakha jay, karon ora khub choto. Tumi ki bhabcho, ami kotha bolte bolte?

Ami condom niye amar moner bhabna ektu change korchi, mone hocche ora carry kora kono khoti hobe na. Ar jodi ora sob kichu prevent kore, je tumi bolle, ta hole sheta amar shona kotha theke onek bhalo. Ami oi consequences avoid korte chai.
Thik ache. Tumi ekhon baba hote chai na, ami anuman kori.
Ha.

Tumi je sob kichu bolle, amar kache khub gurutwo ache. Ami boli eight ba nine.
